means: 消耗( consume的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It was work which consumed most of his waking hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 他醒着的时候大部分时间都在工作。

sentence.Network_en: They are consumed with jealousy at her success.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对她的成功充满了嫉妒。

entry.def: If you are consumed with a feeling or idea, it affects you very strongly indeed.

example.ex: They are consumed with jealousy at her success.
example.tran: 他们对她的成功充满了嫉妒。

auth_sentence.content: The quantity of paper consumed by catalogs is daunting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The quantity of paper consumed by catalogs is daunting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The quantity of paper consumed by catalogs is daunting.

auth_sentence.content: Huge amounts of time are consumed in its preparation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Huge amounts of time are consumed in its preparation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Huge amounts of time are consumed in its preparation.

auth_sentence.content: His intimates found him consumed by guilt and fear.
auth_sentence.res_content: His intimates found him consumed by guilt and fear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His intimates found him consumed by guilt and fear.

Sentence.sentence: It is widely consumed despite its ill reputation.
Studies have shown, for instance, that eating in front of the TV ( or a similar distraction) can increase both hunger and the amount of food consumed
Moreover, the participants reported feeling more full when they thought they'd consumed a higher-calorie shake.
About 70% of this is consumed by the global agriculture sector, and the level of use will continue to rise over the coming decades.
